net.proteusframework.data.filesystem.http

Class FileSystemEntityResourceFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.data.filesystem.http.FileSystemEntityResourceFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.ResourceFactory

    public class FileSystemEntityResourceFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.ResourceFactory
    Resource factory for file stored objects.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

      • parseIdentifier

        @Nullable
protected static java.lang.String parseIdentifier(java.lang.String identifier)
        Parse a possibly an identifier w/ checksum.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier w/ checksum.
        Returns:
        the validated identifier w/o the checksum. If the identifier didn't include a checksum, then the parameter is returned unchanged. If the identifier did include a checksum, and the computed checksum was invalid, null is returned.
        See Also:
        addChecksum(CharSequence)

      • setRelativePathPattern

        public void setRelativePathPattern(@Nullable
                          java.util.regex.Pattern relativePathPattern)
        Set the relative path pattern. This is intended to be set during configuration, not at runtime. The pattern must not start with a digit or match other builtin patterns.
        Parameters:
        relativePathPattern - the pattern.
        See Also:
        FSE_LIST_RESOURCE_PREFIX, DIRECTORY_RESOURCE_PREFIX
